name: The Point Marketing Ltd.
description:
After launching and establishing the agency in Clifton Bristol, in 2005 The Point relocated to England’s smallest city, Wells Somerset. With our 20th trading anniversary on the near horizon, we have recently completed an office move to the award winning Charlton Estate in the ancient market Somerset town of Shepton Mallet. Rubbing shoulders with illustrious neighbours such as Sky, Easynet and Kerryfresh, we look forward to taking The Point into a third successful decade.
By drawing upon many years experience by working at large London-based and international advertising agencies and with major brands and services, The Point helps brands compete, flourish and excel.
